text: Kyungsung University·Pukyong National University Station () is a station on the Busan Metro Line 2 in Daeyeon-dong, Nam District, Busan, South Korea. ==External links== * Cyber station information from Busan Transportation Corporation Category:Busan Metro stations Category:Nam District, Busan Category:Railway stations opened in 2001 Category:Railway stations at university and college campuses
title: Kyungsung University–Pukyong National University station
